body: Spack is internally using a patched version of `argparse` mainly to backport Python 3 functionality into Python 2. This PR makes it such that for the supported Python 3 versions we use `argparse` from the standard Python library. This PR has been extracted from #25371 where it was needed to be able to use recent versions of `pytest`.
title: Use a patched argparse only in Python 2.X
